title: SpeedkitLayer
description: The loading behavior of webpages based on nuxtjs is designed in such a way that all necessary Javascript resources are preloaded and directly initialized with the initial load of the page. However, this behavior creates a negative impact on the Lighthouse Performance Score (TTI) for larger pages that have an increased initial load of additional resources, such as fonts, images, plugins, modules (nuxt-i18n, ...).
